Class CredentialValidationCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jetty.security.jaspi.callback.CredentialValidationCallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callback

    public class CredentialValidationCallback
extends Object
implements Callback
    CredentialValidationCallback Store a jetty Credential for a user so that it can be validated by jaspi
